description: Flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --verbose
options.description: Print more information... This option is repeatable...

options.name: --output-file
options.description: Redirect report to a file.

options.name: --append-config
options.description: Provide extra config files to parse...

options.name: --config
options.description: Path to the config file that will be the authoritative config source...

options.name: --isolated
options.description: Ignore all configuration files.

options.name: --enable-extensions
options.description: Enable plugins and extensions that are otherwise disabled by default

options.name: --require-plugins
options.description: Require specific plugins to be installed before running

options.name: --version
options.description: show program's version number and exit

options.name: --quiet
options.description: Report only file names, or nothing. This option is repeatable.

options.name: --color
options.description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`.

options.name: --count
options.description: Print total number of errors to standard output...

options.name: --exclude
options.description: Comma-separated list of files or directories to exclude. (Default: [...])

options.name: --extend-exclude
options.description: Comma-separated list of files or directories to add to the list of excluded ones.

options.name: --filename
options.description: Only check for filenames matching the patterns... (Default: ['*.py'])

options.name: --stdin-display-name
options.description: The name used when reporting errors from code passed via stdin... (Default: stdin)

options.name: --format
options.description: Format errors according to the chosen formatter... (Default: default)

options.name: --hang-closing
options.description: Hang closing bracket instead of matching indentation...

options.name: --ignore
options.description: Comma-separated list of error codes to ignore... (Default: E121,E123,E126,E226,E24,E704,W503,W504)

options.name: --extend-ignore
options.description: Comma-separated list of error codes to add to the list of ignored ones.

options.name: --per-file-ignores
options.description: A pairing of filenames and violation codes...

options.name: --max-line-length
options.description: Maximum allowed line length... (Default: 79)

options.name: --max-doc-length
options.description: Maximum allowed doc line length... (Default: None)

options.name: --indent-size
options.description: Number of spaces used for indentation (Default: 4)

options.name: --select
options.description: Limit the reported error codes to codes prefix-matched by this list...

options.name: --extend-select
options.description: Add additional error codes to the default `--select`...

options.name: --disable-noqa
options.description: Disable the effect of "# noqa"...

options.name: --show-source
options.description: Show the source generate each error or warning.

options.name: --no-show-source
options.description: Negate --show-source

options.name: --statistics
options.description: Count errors.

options.name: --exit-zero
options.description: Exit with status code "0" even if there are errors.

options.name: --jobs
options.description: Number of subprocesses to use... (Default: auto)

options.name: --tee
options.description: Write to stdout and output-file.

options.name: --benchmark
options.description: Print benchmark information about this run of Flake8

options.name: --bug-report
options.description: Print information necessary when preparing a bug report

options.name: --max-complexity
options.description: [mccabe] McCabe complexity threshold

options.name: --builtins
options.description: [pyflakes] define more built-ins, comma separated
